Beach.description: A sandy shore with gentle waves, scattered driftwood, and occasional crabs. Perfect for beginner survivors.

Mountain.description: Steep cliffs with chilling winds, offering rich ores but home to dangerous wildlife.

Caves.description: Dark and damp caves filled with treasures, but fraught with hidden dangers like cave-ins and venomous creatures.

Dark Forest.description: An ominous forest cloaked in shadows, brimming with magical plants and ferocious creatures.

Desert.description: A vast, arid landscape with scorching heat, offering rare treasures for the bold adventurer.
